attributes.title: oops

attributes.title: APP IS VERY BIAS - Gen Z
attributes.review: Most messages, articles, and announcements inside the Trump app have no named author; they rarely cite sources beyond government press releases and tweets from Trump’s own supporters and White House staff. The app also has campaign releases that attack social-media companies like Twitter and Snapchat, berating them for perceived bias and lack of transparency on one hand while adopting opaque and attention-driven strategies themselves. -Gen Z

attributes.title: ✨where’s the flavor?✨
attributes.review: i don’t understand this app, also my cellphones battery got damaged because of this app, i think it attracted ghosts to my house. This isn’t a good app. Dear app: leave🧚🏽‍♀️✨💓and never come back😌🧚🏽‍♀️✨💖

attributes.title: HELP ME
attributes.review: okay so i’m not a part of this gen z tik tok thing and I LOVE LOVE LOVE the president!! but there’s a HUGE BUG I don’t know how to fix!!! so whenever I open up the app I see this picture of donald trump, right? well I log on everyday to see his cute face but today something weird happened. he started TALKING TO ME??? he called me stinky, rude, and fake news (which was really hurtful because I love him so much 🥺) well I still came back to the app because even is donny doesn’t like me I still love him 💗🤗🥰 but last night it got really bad and I couldn’t take it anymore. I threw my phone away :(((((( but the next day I could still hear him. IS DONALD TRUMP’S SPIRIT STALKING ME???????

attributes.title: f*ck you
attributes.review: this app gave me chlamidya. trash. one star.
